alert.note: Alert for Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 12:39AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walton County through 130 AM EDT... At 1239 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Between, or near Monroe, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Loganville, Social Circle, Walnut Grove, Between, Good Hope, Jersey, Ebenezer, Nicholasville, Youth, Pannell, Campton, Herndonville and Gratis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
